results.name: Expansion of f(x, x^10) in powers of x where f(, ) is Ramanujan's general theta function.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Characterisctic function of generalized 13-gonal numbers A195313.
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 0, 0, Boole @ IntegerQ @ Sqrt @ (88 n + 81)];
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ -x, x^11] QPochhammer[ -x^10, x^11] QPochhammer[ x^11], {x, 0, n}];
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jan 30 2017
